nodes.bodyText: For reference, after discussing, we will update this comment to: create a map view and set the map to it across the board
was there a reason this one didn't get updated to mapView.setViewpoint? just curious.

@Rachael-E originally I only changed this where the Viewpoint had been set in the map constructor. So this had always had the Viewpoint set on the map separate to the constructor. However since we're going for it now, I'll refactor and test in any Samples that have had the key added / already been edited in some way.
